item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 23, 2025 at 1:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. NixOS and reproducible builds could have detected the xz backdoor (146 points | 55 comments)
2. Map Features in OpenStreetMap with Computer Vision (177 points | 36 comments)

7. Domu Technology Inc. (YC S24) Is Hiring a Vibe Coder ( | hide)

24. Understanding R1-Zero-Like Training: A Critical Perspective (96 points | 11 comments)

26. Scallop – A Language for Neurosymbolic Programming (183 points | 48 comments)
27. Next.js version 15.2.3 has been released to address a security vulnerability (107 points | 74 comments)
28. Hubble Captures Vivid Auroras in Jupiter's Atmosphere (2016) (38 points | 7 comments)
29. Blue Ghost lander captures sunset shots on moon before falling silent (64 points | 25 comments)
